name: Dungeon of Unity
description: "Dungeon of Unity" is a top-down, adventure-ish arcade game starring Gerald the Glue Bottle. In it, you must travel through a dungeon and unite with the other creatures, who are in a blind panic.  Once you unite, you must then bring them to the "Rescue Zones" to score points and progress. Try to get as many in at once as possible to maximize points, but be careful not to run out of moves.
